short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps users with data privacy by blurring chat bar on chat.openai.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGpt Bar Hider - Safeguard Your Privacy, One Click at a Time!

Personalized Privacy: Tired of prying eyes during screen sharing sessions? With ChatGpt Bar Hider, keep your chat titles under wraps, for your eyes only.

Seamless Integration: Our extension seamlessly blends into your browser, ready to provide privacy at the click of a button. Can you think of anything more convenient?

User-Friendly Interface: It doesn't get simpler than this! A single, intuitive button to blur and unblur your chat bar. You'll wonder how you ever managed without it.

Consistent Performance: Whether you're navigating away or coming back to your chat, the extension consistently maintains your selected privacy setting. Isn't it great when things just work?
